languages.text: "Может, дело в паранойе после многих лет службы, но я не люблю тишину. Особенно такую... Абсолютную".
languages.translation_comment:
On the frozen world with the Drukhari turret trap.
Cassia: "Such a peaceful scene, the likes of which I haven't seen in a long time. No bright flashes, no riot of colours... Just pure white canvas."

traits.locale_text: "Может, дело в паранойе после многих лет службы, но я не люблю тишину. Особенно такую... Абсолютную".

languages.text: "Call it paranoia after many years of service, but I don't like silence. Especially when it's like this... Absolute."
languages.translation_comment:
On the frozen world with the Drukhari turret trap.
Cassia: "Such a peaceful scene, the likes of which I haven't seen in a long time. No bright flashes, no riot of colours... Just pure white canvas."
languages.original_text: "Может, дело в паранойе после многих лет службы, но я не люблю тишину. Особенно такую... Абсолютную".

traits.locale_text: "Call it paranoia after many years of service, but I don't like silence. Especially when it's like this... Absolute."
"Call it paranoia after many years of service, but I don't like silence. Especially when it's like this... Absolute."
"Call it paranoia after many years of service, but I don't like silence. Especially when it's like this... Absolute."
"Call it paranoia after many years of service, but I don't like silence. Especially when it's like this... Absolute."
"Call it paranoia after many years of service, but I don't like silence. Especially when it's like this... Absolute."
"Call it paranoia after many years of service, but I don't like silence. Especially when it's like this... Absolute."

languages.text: 「長年の勤めによる被害妄想だと思ってくれてもいいですが、私は静寂が好きではないのです。特に、こんなふうに…完全な静けさは」
languages.original_text: "Call it paranoia after many years of service, but I don't like silence. Especially when it's like this... Absolute."

traits.locale_text: 「長年の勤めによる被害妄想だと思ってくれてもいいですが、私は静寂が好きではないのです。特に、こんなふうに…完全な静けさは」

languages.text: "Nennt es Paranoia nach vielen Jahren des Dienstes, aber ich mag keine Stille. Besonders solche Stille ... Absolut."
languages.original_text: "Call it paranoia after many years of service, but I don't like silence. Especially when it's like this... Absolute."

traits.locale_text: "Nennt es Paranoia nach vielen Jahren des Dienstes, aber ich mag keine Stille. Besonders solche Stille ... Absolut."

languages.text: « Toutes ces années de service m'ont peut-être rendu paranoïaque, mais je n'aime pas le silence. Surtout quand il est aussi... absolu. »
languages.original_text: "Call it paranoia after many years of service, but I don't like silence. Especially when it's like this... Absolute."

traits.locale_text: « Toutes ces années de service m'ont peut-être rendu paranoïaque, mais je n'aime pas le silence. Surtout quand il est aussi... absolu. »

languages.text: «Llámelo paranoia después de muchos años de servicio, pero no me gusta el silencio. Sobre todo cuando es tan... absoluto».
languages.original_text: "Call it paranoia after many years of service, but I don't like silence. Especially when it's like this... Absolute."

traits.locale_text: «Llámelo paranoia después de muchos años de servicio, pero no me gusta el silencio. Sobre todo cuando es tan... absoluto».

languages.text: “我在法务部干了这么多年，可能确实有点偏执，但我不喜欢安静，尤其是像这种……没有一点声音的时候。”
languages.original_text: "Call it paranoia after many years of service, but I don't like silence. Especially when it's like this... Absolute."

traits.locale_text: “我在法务部干了这么多年，可能确实有点偏执，但我不喜欢安静，尤其是像这种……没有一点声音的时候。”

languages.text: "Paranoyak olabilirim ama sessizlik beni rahatsız eder. Özellikle de böyle mutlak sessizlik..."
languages.original_text: "Call it paranoia after many years of service, but I don't like silence. Especially when it's like this... Absolute."

traits.locale_text: "Paranoyak olabilirim ama sessizlik beni rahatsız eder. Özellikle de böyle mutlak sessizlik..."

languages.original_text: "Call it paranoia after many years of service, but I don't like silence. Especially when it's like this... Absolute."
